They are using their strength today to eliminate the worst version of the future and to set themselves up for a real $GOOGL or $META or $MSFT partnership. That‚Äôs exactly what you want an AI Utility operator to do before stepping into multi-gigawatt commitments.

I‚Äôm fine taking on more volatility if it means owning one of the only operators that can grow into the AI power & compute buildout. That is the whole point of this theme. ¬πAn option is a contract that gives the holder the right, but not the obligation, to buy or sell a specific asset at a predetermined price on or before a specified date. Options are a type of derivative, meaning their value is derived from the underlying asset.

¬≤A put option is a contract that gives the buyer the right, but not the obligation, to sell an underlying asset at a specified price (the strike price) by or on a specific date (the expiration date).

Investment in the fund is not an investment in the Underlying ETF. Distributions are not guaranteed. This product involves significant risks.
